Description.Text:
Property Location
You'll be centrally located in Bielefeld with a stay at Park Inn by Radisson Bielefeld, minutes from Kunsthalle Bielefeld and Farmhouse Museum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Neustaedter Marienkirche and Nicolai Church.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 119 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as bicycles to rent or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional amenities at this Art Deco hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Bielefeld? This hotel has 4907 square feet (456 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

You'll be centrally located in Bielefeld with a stay at Park Inn by Radisson Bielefeld, minutes from Kunsthalle Bielefeld and Farmhouse Museum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Neustaedter Marienkirche and Nicolai Church.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kunsthalle Bielefeld - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Farmhouse Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Neustaedter Marienkirche - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Nicolai Church - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Old Market Square - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Sparrenberg Castle - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Theater Bielefeld - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Old Town Hall - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Olderdissen Animal Park - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Schuco Arena - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Bielefeld Hospital Chapel - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Historical Museum Bielefeld - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Museum Huelsmann - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Bielefeld Japanese Garden - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Peter August Boeckstiegel Museum - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi

The preferred airport for Park Inn by Radisson Bielefeld is Paderborn (PAD-Paderborn - Lippstadt) - 46 km / 28.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Hannover Airport (HAJ): Approximate driving time to Park Inn Bielefeld is 60 minutes and distance is 110 kilometres (68.5 miles).

Getting there: S-Bahn services run from the airport to Hannover central station every 30 minutes between 5 AM and midnight. A single fare costs â‚¬2.40. From here, trains run to Bielefeld once an hour; journey time approximately 50 minutes. Alternatively, taxis are available at the airport. All prices subject to change.

Getting around: Bielefeld is served by buses and trams. The surrounding area is best explored by car.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
